content: संक्रमः {@--1@} Concurrence, going together. {@--2@} Transition, traversing, transfer, progress. {@--3@} The passage of a planetary body through the zodiacal signs. {@--4@} Moving, travelling. --मः --मं {@--1@} A difficult or narrow passage. {@--2@} A causeway, bridge; नदीमार्गेषु च तथा संक्रमानवसादयेत् <ls>Mb.</ls> {@--3@} A medium or means of attaining any object; तामेव संक्रमीकृत्य <ls>Dk.</ls>; सोऽतिथिः स्वर्गसंक्रमः <ls>Pt. 4. 2.</ls>
